page.title: 11ENTERTAINMENTS
page.content: Many people in this rural area find entertainment in their own homes by watching{television,}especially in the winter. Nevertheless there is a real community spirit in Rhydycroesau which results in numerous activities in the village hall throughout the year.There are different organisations which hold regular meetings, such as the Womens' Institute. The older people in Rhydycroesau spoke of whist drives, beetle drives and barbecues. A major annual event is the Christmas {pantomine}which takes place every year. Local folk spend weeks rehearsing for the event which is so popular in the locality that it is performed for several weekends. Not only do local people run the show, but are also the target of many jokes! Young folk fortunate enough to be mobile go to the{cinema}in Oswestry.
